title: Najawa's Avatar (New Poll)
content:
Okay; I decided to continue using the catch phrase "Tough Guys Wear Pink"

Here are the canidates!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shucks.gif[/img]

[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod.jpg[/img] - If you Really like this; go ahead.
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod2.jpg[/img] - Keen Jumps over a flame, shoots a mimrock, has to avoid a lick when landing, and all before dinner.
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod3.jpg[/img] - Put on that game face!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img]
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod4.jpg[/img] - Just what this forum needs: a bit of attitude!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod5.jpg[/img] - Look at what keen's pointing to (no, not the skypests)

So, what do you think?

The polls open... *looks at watch*
In one minute.

*1 minute later*

Okay; polls now open:

title: Suggestion (and remake)
content:
The original is the best of those, IMKO. However, it needs improving:
a) Correct sizing; ezBoard accepts 60x60--yours is 64x64
b) Cleaner font, preferably from Keen4-6 (using 4fon0001.bmp that ModKeen exports)
c) Different background, maybe something from keen4-6

Something like this:
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v192/Jimage/keenlike/NajawaAv.gif[/img]

Feel free to use that one if you wish.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Suggestion (and remake)
content: and d) if you're just going to have a single background colour make it transparent, it looks strange when you fill it with any random colour.  Either that or make the image go all the way out to the edge, like CommanderSpleen's avatar and example.

title: Re: Suggestion (and remake)
content:
Probably the first, but the Spleen's suggestion is better.

Anyways, in your other poll the Legolas sprite looks really cool! Good work, I was very surprised![url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Suggestion (and remake)
content:
I find it really surprising that some people here seem to care about your avatar.-----------------
[img]http://jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/cr/CrazyFrog___Axel_F_Rocket.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Oooo!!!
content:
I like Spleans... But I'm starting to also like the game face. Is there a way to reset a poll, and then change what you're voting about... or do I have to post a new poll "Najawa's Avatar (Even Newer)" "Najawa's Avatar (Newest)" and then "Najawa's Avatar (The Even Newestest!!!)"?

I also like spleens, but I think I'd use a Keen 4 Keen because he's got more action poses.

-- NAJAWA --

BTW - 60 x 60? Geese; All mine were made be K:M's standards: 80 x 80. Geese. I'll fix them then.

title: Pollease!
content:
Why not just turn this into a discussion thread? Polls about this sort of thing are incredibly inconclusive. Asking "Which do you like best?" is far less productive than "How can this be improved?"Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Pollease!
content:
As for improvement, please make it a PNG or else a GIF, not a JPEG.
There is only a tiny amount of colours, and as such small sizes filesize won't matter much anyway.
The JPEG smoothing, especially of the words, is really annoying (to me).Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: .BMP
content:
I make them as Bitmaps... But for some reason; www.photobucket.com makes them .jpeg when I upload them (look for najawa's album [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] ).

I use them to host any picture I use when posting, or in my avatar.

Oh well. I guess this thread moves to the plain old "Miscelaneous Forum."

(Sorry Admins; I would have started there if I knew this topic would get so much attention, and that I'd have to remake my avatar sooo many times - Delete this topic at will).

Topic closed; see you in miscelanious.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Arg.
content:
[hr]Retodon As for improvement, please make it a PNG or else a GIF, not a JPEG.

title: Srry
content:
Sorry, I just can't help it; when I get my own website; that'll all change (the day I get my website).

BTW - Please post new comments in the new topic; I made a new one, so I would keep having to make new ones!?. (If that made sense?)

I basically made a disscussion so I wouldn't have to make hundreds of polls.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Srry
content:
Maybe if you convert the BMP into PNG (or GIF) yourself, the website software doesn't (smartly) decide to make it smaller, and make it a JPEG (which is less smart).
Download IrfanView, a free, easy, and overall useful programme for these kinds of things.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: OK:
content:
